DOC.brief_summary: In a double blind placebo-controlled cross-over study the effect of Sildenafil on aura and migraine headache induction is tested in patient with migraine with aura.
DOC.brief_title: Induction of Migraine Aura With Sildenafil
DOC.criteria: Migraine with aura Minimum of 2 attacks/year Any other type of headache, except tensiontype headache < 4 days per month History of cardio or cerebrovascular diseases Hypertension or hypotension Any daily intake of medication, including prophylactic migraine treatment, except oral contraceptives Pregnancy and lactation
